body:
Updating the neovim recipe to:
- Add version 0.4.4
- Fix build errors for github branches master and stable
  - Lua version was set at 5.1:5.2, but neovim only allows Lua version 5.1, not 5.2
  - Dependency versions were picked incorrectly for labels stable and master
  - For centos7, a newer version of git was required. Added as a build dependency
  - For version 0.2.0, building failed due to issues with dependency libvterm

Updating libvterm:
- Version 0.0.0 was pointing to the incorrect file (typo?)
- Version 0.1.4 was added
title: Update neovim build and libvterm
